thread.section_title: Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 4 visits, never disappointed
thread.title_full: 4 visits, never disappointed - Review of Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 980VMA
title: 4 visits, never disappointed
text: Aptly named, Eiffel tower is just a few meters away and you have good views on the city skyline from the 10th floor meeting rooms. Been there 4 times in three consecutive years. Great staff. I like their breakfast (there is an omelette chef). Nothing negative to report.
